name: Introduction to Physics
description: This course provides an introduction to the fundamentals of physics.

name: Classical Mechanics
description: This course covers the principles of classical mechanics.

name: Thermodynamics
description: This course covers the principles of thermodynamics.

name: Quantum Mechanics
description: This course covers the principles of quantum mechanics.

name: Introduction to Biophysics
description: This course provides an introduction to the fundamentals of biophysics.

name: Biophysical Chemistry
description: This course covers the principles of biophysical chemistry.

name: Advanced Biophysics
description: This course covers advanced topics in biophysics.
